sub_title: Quality Systems - Ensuring Quality through Process Improvement and Efficiency
summary:
I am a challenge oriented professional looking for constant growth in my career, with 10 years of experience in a fast-paced environment. Bilingual Engineer (studying Dutch as a third language at the moment) with experience in different areas such as Quality, Customer Experience and Manufacturing. 

Making processes more efficient and assuring the quality in all the stages of the process is one of my passions, also visiting new places and meeting new people is part of who I am. I believe that knowing the world and different cultures can help us to achieve better results, in our personal and professional life.

I love making connections and this has been proving during my professional path in 4 different countries. Working in a multicultural environment (Brazil, Ireland, Hungary and The Netherlands) where I have built significant relationships, professionally and personally. 

I took a leap year to go to Ireland to improve my English skills and in the meantime I had the opportunity to work as a service provider in a caffee. 

Before this experience I worked for 8 years at PepsiCo Brazil, auditing support activities regards the process, customer comunnication and assessment guidelines, ensuring that the quality thinking and quality standards would be followed during the process were ones of my main activities. 

At the moment, I am working at DSM Biomedical in Geleen (The Netherlands) as a Quality Systems Officer, and guaranting that quality processes and procedures are being followed is part of my daily routine.  


Contact via: marianacalegari30@gmail.com

profile_positions.description:
Data entry and analysis, KPI and incident monitoring ensuring the quality of processes and implementation of process improvements. Customer support in the IT area, creating a positive experience and building relationships through problem understanding, troubleshooting and fast solution.

Hiring key words: Customer Experience, Customer Relations, Quality Process, Process Improvements.
profile_positions.title: Customer Support Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Supervised the Production Assistants for the 3 shifts, assigning them in all tasks, guiding them in all problems and relocating them according to the need. Handled daily issues during the process related to the team. Developed action plans to correct problems related to the team and the smooth running of daily activities in order to meet the established goals, trained 100% of the process assistants team (over 100 employees) regarding food safety and quality (GMP), and performed internal quality audits to ensure that the processes were carried out in accordance with the standards, policies and procedures that meet the requirements.

Hiring keywords
Management, People Management, English, training, leadership, reports, SAP, support, qualification, manufacture, ishikawa diagram, 5W, 5W2H, requirements.
profile_positions.title: Production Supervisor | Manufacture

profile_positions.description:
Exchange Experience Studying and Working abroad – Ireland – EU.

Took a leap year living abroad (in Dublin – Ireland) to improve English skills and in the meantime working in a caffee during the weekends. Ensuring the quality of the service since the reception of the customers and during their experience at the Caffee. Serving and creating relationships throuht quality service and quality of product. 
 
Hiring keywords:
Bilingual, multicultural environment, quality, quality service, product quality, organization, management, customer experience.
profile_positions.title: Exchange Student

profile_positions.description:
Analysed and audited critical quality incidents, identifying the variation/cause and necessary analysis in the product. Auditing claims and support activities regards to processes, customers communications, assessment guidelines and compliance requirements. Guided the process and customer service team, dealing with critical/sensitive issues ensuring 100% follow-up within 24 hours. Monitoring, prioritizing internal flows, listening to a sample of critical customer´ calls to ensure quality of the call and if the information given was appropriated. 
Provided technical support reviewing internal documents and developed a new process (Crisis Management Process). Consolidation & Report of insights captured (voice of the consumer to other areas of the Company).

Hiring keywords
Customer Relations, Customer Experience, Quality, Critical Consumers, Training, Leadership, reports, CRM, monitoring, KPI, Quality Evaluation, Feedbacks, Problem Solving, Control Plan, Analyse-5Whys, Process. Processes, Procedures.
profile_positions.title: Customer Relations Analyst | Quality

profile_positions.description:
Implementation of the 5S methodology in the administrative area of one of PepsiCo Brazil plants. Direct contact with BPO, training/coaching and assisting the team about company products and processes. 
Improvement of 66,7% in AST (Average Service Time) in messages received by social networks through the development of a FAQ. Assisted the Quality and Customer Service team, in the review and supply of registrations/information, planned the guidelines and ensured that all the technical information needed during the data entry (products variation) were updated and available on CRM System.

Hiring keywords
Continuous Improvement, 5S, Training, Trainer, Customer Relations, Quality, Improvement, Costs Reduction, Process, CRM, AST.
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Relations Assistant | Quality

profile_positions.description:
Technical Analysis on Claimed Products to identify the process variation, root cause (Ishikawa Diagram/5W) and development of correction plans ( through Brainstorming with multi-experienced team). Validation of Technical Reports issued by certified laboratories of claimed products, ensured that the analyzes carried out, such as methods and results, are within the indicated parameters, to release the results to clients. 
Control of GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) - Monitored and conducted audits. Creation and development of reports to control the team´s goals (KPI´s) and Complaints Reports – understanding the variation and analyzing the investigations done to categorize the incident. Trained and supported the Production Team regarding the necessary analyzes during the product manufacturing process.


Hiring keywords: Quality, Continuous Improvement, training, reports, GMP, CRM, AST, KPI, Good Manufaturing Practices, excel, IMS, integrated management system, ishikawa diagram, 5W, 5W2H, Root Causes.
profile_positions.title: Food Technician

volunteer_experiences.description:
Environmental Education for children.

Development of School Garden Project which the goal was to help the children to learn about the environment, to create better eating habits and work in team.
Awaken the student's critical thinking; encouraged the adoption and use of good eating habits and making them feel part of the environment while producing food that would complement school meals (vegetables and salads).

company.name: Projeto Transformando Comunidades da PepsiCo do Brasil

volunteer_experiences.description:
Participation in the Project Transforming Communities | PepsiCo do Brasil | 2014 - 2017

This project aims to benefit the local population through voluntary actions in philanthropic organizations elected by the internal committee.
- In 2014 the project defined was the realization of a Reading and Play Room for children in need of a school in Itu (countryside city from São Paulo - Brazil). Supporting and encouraging reading from childhood.
- The Committee chose to proceed with the project to encourage reading and in 2015 we continued with the project to renovate the Mobile Library.
Where a truck was renovated and the internal part becomes a Library. The purpose of the Library is to travel around the city of Itu and give access to reading for everyone.
- In 2016, the Pepsico de Itu's Transforming Communities committee chose to work on the topic of Women's Empowerment, supporting the "Kairós Institute" in the project to reform and create the "Espaço Mulher".
The "Espaço Mulher" was designed for Professional Training, in the areas of Aesthetics and Beauty, of women from the city of Itu.

Volunteering at non-governamental organization helping Refugees from Ukraine 

Actively participating in the dissemination of the campaign - collection of food, toiletries and clothing. Assembly of daily hygiene kits and hygiene kit in against Covid-19 (face-masks and hand-sanitizer). Organization of donations received (clothes/shoes and food – perishable and non-perishable). Food delivery at one of the refugee reception centers in Budapest.

skills: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points (HACCP)
